Title: Sinbad: Soratobu Hime to Himitsu no Shima Pilot
Description: [Sinbad: Soratobu Hime to Himitsu no Shima, " pilot footage included with the DVD release. It features Sana's chase scene in which Sinbad first interacts with her. The footage was not recycled for the film and no dialogue is used."]
